alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 07 at 2:17PM AKST until November 08 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility to one half mile or less at times. Heaviest snow in the Nulato Hills. Strong winds over higher terrain will cause significant reduction in visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will continue to decrease overnight and into early Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow and blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
